title: Multiculture Vic
subtitle: With sadness, we offer our heartfelt condolences to the family of Victor Borg AM. As a leader & champion, his altruistic, uncompromising & principled advocacy for the rights of migrants & refugees contributed to the successful multiculturalism Victoria enjoys today. Vale Victor. pic.twitter.com/f3cTzBc1FJ

title: A Way Home Australia
subtitle: YES, six times. Young people from refugee backgrounds are at least six times more likely to experience homelessness. The risk is higher due to several reasons like the lack of knowledge regarding the homelessness system, lack of social networks and language barrier. #Australiapic.twitter.com/OVl6FGWLGx

title: Rafaan
subtitle: My wonderful supervisor Dr Sue Creagh is presenting this morning on the progress of migrant and refugee students in their first year of schooling! Come along!! #AARE2019pic.twitter.com/VHyiHWb2DI

title: NSW CESE
subtitle: Liverpool West PS supports student engagement and learning through their partnership with @westernsydneyu. Pre-service teachers work with refugee students 4 days a week, building vocabulary, comprehension and their confidence. Learn more: https://www.cese.nsw.gov.au/publications-filter/how-high-expectations-and-engagement-in-primary-school-drive-student-learning … #NSWcesepic.twitter.com/xTUHWZkLkO

title: Daizy Gedeon
subtitle: This is just so heart-warming. #SesameStreet & the International Rescue Committee have collaborated to help #Syrian #refugee children, not only to educate but to help these traumatised children process emotions. The new program, "Ahlan Simsim", is set to air in February 2020. pic.twitter.com/gTmrYjakYt

title: Amnesty New Zealand
subtitle: “These people who seek asylum. They already have a life because they are human, not because they are a refugee. But there is a strange desire to forget refugee’s human past and remove their identity.” @BehrouzBoochanipic.twitter.com/SJlRC02W2o

title: lyndall kate clipstone
subtitle:
I was no one, a refugee from an unnamed village, a scrawny, clumsy girl hurtling alone through the gathering dark. But when the Darkling had closed his fingers around my wrist, I’d felt different, like something more.
